Package be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.jw.SpaceInvadersV3.GameLogic

Class AbsBullet

java.lang.Object
be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.jw.SpaceInvadersV3.GameLogic.AbsEntity
be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.jw.SpaceInvadersV3.GameLogic.AbsBullet
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbsEnemyBullet, AbsPlayerBullet
public abstract class AbsBullet extends AbsEntity
The AbsBullet class is an abstract representation of a bullet entity in a game. It extends the AbsEntity class and contains fields and methods specific to bullets.

    • hasHit

      public boolean hasHit(AbsCreature creature)
      Determines whether or not this bullet has hit a particular creature.
      Parameters:
      creature - the creature to check if this bullet has hit.
      Returns:
      true if this bullet has hit the creature, false otherwise.
